author: Jelisa Castrodale, Hilary Pollack
title: Unexpected Side Effect of Quarantine: We're All Setting Our Kitchens on Fire
description: Scald burns and house fires are on the rise as amateur cooks under stay-at-home orders realize they have no idea what they're doing.
content:
Two weeks ago, the National Fire Protection Association (NFPA) urged everyone who is currently stuck at home to take a little extra care in the kitchen, because firefighters know how bad we can all be at cooking for ourselves. 
 According to the NFPA, cookin… [+3088 chars]
